title: Rope Cosmetology 1978 JAP.DVDRiP.XViD-HoRRoRFReaKK
description:
Kanako is a married woman who receives an invitation from Tomoe, a lesbian lover from her past, to attend a showing of artwork by Isaku, Tomoe's husband. Isaku's paintings have an S&M theme which surprises Kanako. Tomoe persuades Kanako to begin going with her to a class in which she is learning how to behave like a proper female dog. Kanako's husband, EiichirÃ…ï¿½, is suspicious about her activities. After hiring a private detective and learning about her perverse hobbies, EiichirÃ…ï¿½ throws Kanako into a landfill. The film ends with EiichirÃ…ï¿½ apparently taking his dog for a walk. The camera pans down to show that, despite his apparent objections to her lessons, EiichirÃ…ï¿½ is in fact walking Kanako, who is on all fours on a dog leash
